lead_paragraph: Jay Wright slipped in and out of his competitive consciousness in the national championship game. He cringed as a coach as Villanova's late lead trickled away against North Carolina. He loved the frenzy as a basketball fan watching the Wildcats and Tar Heels go shot-for-shot in one of the NCAA Tournament's classic finals.

headline.print_headline: Villanova, Wright Chasing Title Repeat With Lessons From Run
headline.main: Villanova, Wright Chasing Title Repeat With Lessons From Run
